body: I came to fap but not getting any boner. Sad

The ending pretty bad and good at same time, it's bad cause she ended up with the NTR guy, But it's kinda nice how she doesn't end up being a sex toy or her husband being a cuckold loser, and in the NTR guy keeps her company. . . But yeah, The ending is a bit sad for her ex-husband. If only the ending ended where she was caught cheating the impression we will get will be different, we can conclude that they made up and went about their day as usual (a bit strange, but if you are an optimist maybe this is what you will conclude)

For stories I give 7/10 and for art it is 8/10
